artist: Sculptor: Anthony Greenwood; Designer: J. E. Brubaker; Manufacturer: Grey Iron Casting Company
description: bank building with female figure seated in front in blue dress; lever on back activates woman's arm which "shovels" coins into the side of the building and then a sign saying, "Trenton Trust," pops out of the top of the building like toast
markings: on sticker: [Mary Roebbing Bank, Trenton Trust, 742,500 neg no. 190\"; on tape label: [No. 190]
title: "Mary Roebling, Trenton Trust" mechanical bank
